title: Creole–Maple Air Fryer Chicken
description: Juicy, flavorful chicken breast seasoned with Creole spices, maple, and lemon. Perfect for salads, bowls, or meal prep.
ingredients: 1.5 lbs (680 g) chicken breast, cut into 1–1.5 inch pieces
1.5 tbsp olive oil or canola oil
1.5 tbsp lemon juice (≈ juice of 3/4 lemon)
instructions: Add chicken pieces to a bowl and toss with oil, Creole seasoning, garlic powder, maple syrup, lemon juice, and optional smoked paprika.
Place the chicken in a single layer in the air fryer basket.
Cook for 8–10 minutes, shaking or turning halfway through.
Remove when chicken reaches 160°F and let rest for 3–5 minutes to finish at 165°F.
Cool slightly, then slice or chop for salads, bowls, or meal prep.
notes: If cooking whole chicken breasts instead of chunks, air fry 9–12 minutes per side at 380°F. Excellent with Lemon–Garlic Yogurt Dressing.
